articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The FSB's latest recommendations take aim at DeFi, suggesting that regulators include the niche in their monitoring frameworks.
articles.title: G20 Financial Stability Board Report Flags DeFi 'Vulnerabilities'

articles.author: Max Koopsen
articles.description: Norwegian financial crimes agency Økokrim has tracked and seized a portion of the funds stolen in the Axie Infinity Ronin hack.
articles.title: Norwegian Authorities Recoup $5.9M From Axie Infinity Ronin Hack

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Men’s magazine GQ is launching a new NFT collection, offering holders exclusive merchandise and access to its GQ3 community.
articles.title: GQ Joins List of Legacy Media Outlets Boarding NFT Bandwagon

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Avraham Eisenberg's legal team has objected to a January lawsuit that would see him return $47 million to Mango Labs.
articles.title: Mango Markets Attacker Urges Court to Let Him Keep Hacked Funds

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Elon Musk tweeted a pic of his pet dog Floki yesterday and pumped the price of the eponymous cryptocurrency by nearly 70% overnight.
articles.title: FLOKI Continues Musk-Fueled Rally, Soaring 62% Overnight

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The world’s largest crypto exchange expects it will be able to settle ongoing regulatory investigations in the U.S.
articles.title: Binance Expects to Pay Fines to Settle US Investigations: Report

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Like a Web3-native Snapchat filter or ASCII-based video feed, this experimental art project is minting NFT-based apps across chains.
articles.title: ‘You Are the Art’: Chainspace NFT Portals Connect Bitcoin and Ethereum

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The “Dookey Dash” Ethereum NFT racing game has been plagued by cheating claims.
articles.title: Fortnite Esports Star Wins Bored Ape Yacht Club Challenge

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Riding high on the success of its BLUR token airdrop, the marketplace announced a provocative policy change.
articles.title: Blur Advises NFT Creators to Block OpenSea in Royalties Battle

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: “Every dollar spent in these cases on administrative expenses is $1 less to creditors,” said Judge John Dorsey.
articles.title: FTX Bankruptcy Judge Agrees Independent Examiner Would Mean More Risk

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The SEC commissioner joins Crypto Twitter in picking apart her own agency’s latest crypto proposal.
articles.title: Hester Peirce Says SEC Plan Involves ‘Substantial Departure’ from Status Quo

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: New interest in Bitcoin has pushed the price to a six-month high.
articles.title: Bitcoin Crosses $24K as Ordinals Takes the Network by Storm

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: With Hiro also prepping Bitcoin NFT support in its wallet, Ordinals' place in blockchain history seems secure.
articles.title: Ordinals Support Comes to Bitcoin-Based Web Wallet Xverse

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: In an interview with Decrypt, DeGods founders Frank and Kevin explain why 535 burned Solana NFTs were inscribed on Bitcoin—and what they plan to do with them.
articles.title: 'Bitcoin Is the Best Brand in Crypto': Why DeGods NFTs Are Now on Bitcoin

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The bankrupt crypto lender agreed to a buyout plan after vetting a handful other bids.
articles.title: Celsius Reaches Acquisition Agreement with NovaWulf

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The Central American nation opened a “Bitcoin office” in Switzerland last year.
articles.title: El Salvador to Launch 'Bitcoin Embassy' in Texas

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: A judge has ordered that the names of SBF's co-signers be unsealed.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Forced to Reveal Names of Bond Signers

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The NFT marketplace has taken issue with the collection launched by one of Rihanna’s producers, which offers holders a percentage of future song royalties.
articles.title: OpenSea Halts Trading on Rihanna Music NFTs

articles.author: Will McCurdy,Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The CEO of the Blockchain Association criticized recent statements from both Congresswomen Elizabeth Warren and SEC Chair Gary Gensler.
articles.title: Regulatory Crackdown Feels ‘Like a Crypto Carpet Bombing’: Blockchain Association CEO

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: To dismiss crypto because of its volatility will strengthen it "in terms of how it's safeguarded," the star of "The Matrix" argued.
articles.title: Keanu Reeves: Criticism of Crypto 'Is Only Going to Make it Better'

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Superplastic has launched loads of wacky NFTs and characters, and now Amazon Studios get first dibs on them for TV shows or films.
articles.title: Amazon Funds Web3-Friendly Studio Superplastic in $20 Million Round

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: A new 1 million OP token grant means Lido Finance users looking to earn some extra yield can do so by porting over to Optimism.
articles.title: Lido Finance Kicks Off Yield Farming Event on Ethereum Scaler Optimism

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Crypto assets like Bitcoin pose high risks and as such should be subject to limits on holdings, according to the ECB.
articles.title: ECB Advises Banks Comply With Conservative Cap on Bitcoin Exposure

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Symbiogenesis, an original NFT-driven narrative game, will debut on the scaling network instead of on Ethereum’s mainnet.
articles.title: Final Fantasy Maker Square Enix to Launch NFT Game on Polygon

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The resurrected music brand is expanding its footprint to include digital collectibles.
articles.title: Napster Acquires Mint Songs to Advance Its Web3 Ambitions

articles.author: Max Koopsen
articles.description: As the wider market digests the latest CPI report, crypto markets have been energized by Cardano upgrades and Dogecoin memes.
articles.title: Cardano, Dogecoin Lead Recovery as Crypto Market Recoups $44B

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Political recipients that receive donations in crypto would be unable to spend these funds directly or hold them as assets.
articles.title: New Kansas Bill Could Cap Political Donations in Crypto at $100

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Sam Bankman-Fried, his father, and other insiders have been served subpoenas as part of the crypto exchange's bankruptcy proceedings.
articles.title: FTX Insiders Served Subpoenas Over Fallen Crypto Exchange's Financial Dealings

articles.author: Andrew Hayward,Stephen Graves,Wendy Clack
articles.description: Dogecoin is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency based on a popular Internet meme. The token started off as a joke, but it's become a serious proposition.
articles.title: What is Dogecoin?

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The newest crypto sensation has many flocking to the original blockchain bringing new projects and slow transactions.
articles.title: Over 100K Ordinals Minted on Bitcoin, Bringing Cheers and Network Congestion

articles.description: With the fall of a top-three stablecoin, Tether is emerging as a clear winner.
articles.title: As BUSD Dies, Tether’s USDT Soaks Up Another $1 Billion

articles.description: Binance USD's market cap has dropped to $15 billion, down 31% from its all-time high.
articles.title: Stablecoin Markets Pick Winners and Losers Ahead of SEC Paxos Lawsuit

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Blur airdrop apparently benefited wash traders the most, with the top three wallets each claiming at least $1.5M worth of tokens.
articles.title: NFT Traders Flex Their Blur Airdrops: Here’s Who Got the Most Tokens

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The controversial influencer boasted about his shrewd Bitcoin investments—but Romanian authorities have nabbed at least some of it.
articles.title: Andrew Tate Reveals How Much Bitcoin He’s Had Seized by Authorities

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The owner of BAYC #1626 burned the NFT, to symbolically shift its existence to Bitcoin. But Yuga Labs says it’s an illegitimate Ape.
articles.title: Bored Ape Owner Burns $169K NFT to Move It From Ethereum to Bitcoin

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Senators are tying themselves in knots over how to regulate the digital asset industry.
articles.title: Lawmakers Continue to Quarrel Over ‘Crypto Nightmare’

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Traders who claimed Blur’s “care packages” can open them up today to claim BLUR governance token rewards.
articles.title: Blur Launches Long-Awaited Token Airdrop for Ethereum NFT Traders

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The FCA and local authorities are taking aim at crypto ATMs operating illegally in the country, investigating several sites in Leeds.
articles.title: UK Financial Regulator Cracks Down on Illegal Crypto ATMs

articles.description: In our February 11, 2023 week in review episode, Matthew Diemer, Stacy Elliott, and Stephen Graves talk about the latest developments in the FTX case, 3AC founders trying for a comeback, a16z losing on a big Uniswap vote despite holding 15 million UNI tokens, and NFTs roaring back with CryptoPunks, Bored Apes, and Ordinals NFTs selling hot. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm Week in Review: SEC Targets Staking, a16z Doesn’t Get Its Way, NFTs Popping

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Inflation slowed to 6.4%, but markets, including Bitcoin and Ethereum, are still parsing through several mixed signals from the CPI report.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Trade Sideways as Market Mulls Mixed CPI Report

articles.author: Matt Hussey,Tim Copeland
articles.description: Bakkt is the brainchild of the New York Stock Exchange owners. By creating a cryptocurrency exchange with US government oversight, Bakkt wants to make trading crypto assets as normal as trading shares.
articles.title: What is Bakkt? Everything You Need to Know (2023)

articles.description: Comedic legend Bill Murray sits down with Decrypt at his first exclusive party for NFT holders in Oceanside, California. He describes the project’s origins and why it didn’t feel “mercenary” for him to create an NFT-based membership club.
articles.title: Bill Murray Discusses NFT Project, First Members-Only Event

articles.description: Kristin Smith is Executive Director of the Blockchain Association, which advocates for crypto policy in Washington D.C.—an exhausting effort that Sam Bankman-Fried was closely involved in, until he set it all on fire. Kristin tells Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott how SBF and FTX set things back, but there are still positive signs from crypto friendly voices in Congress. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Kristin Smith and the Crypto Crusade in Washington

articles.description: In our January 28, 2023 week in review episode, Dan Roberts, Matthew Diemer, and Kate Irwin talk about more layoffs in crypto and broader tech (including how Google botched its layoffs), the NFT market rebound and Porsche’s NFT drop (fail or surprise success?), Sam Bankman-Fried’s latest claims about FTX US and the surprising list of big companies on the FTX creditor list, and Ted Cruz’s weird effort to get DC vendors to accept Bitcoin. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Week in Review: Tech Layoffs, Porsche NFTs, Ted Cruz

articles.description: At an investor event in L.A. hosted by watch-to-earn video streaming platform Myco, Decrypt's Sander Lutz moderated a discussion about Film3 with Myco CCO Phil McKenzie, Theta Labs BD Head Andrea Berry, and actor and filmmaker David Bianchi, whose Web3 series "RZR" got funding through NFT drops.
articles.title: How Web3 Is Disrupting Video Streaming: Myco, Theta Labs, and Actor David Bianchi

articles.description: At an investor event in New York hosted by the watch-to-earn video streaming platform Myco, Decrypt's Dan Roberts moderated a lively chat about Film3 with Phil McKenzie from Myco, Toni Thai Sterrett the founder of NFT member collective Bad Grrls Creative Club, Doug Petkanics the founder of decentralized video hosting platform Livepeer, and Daniel Killeen of Avalanche blockchain developer Ava Labs.
articles.title: How Web3 and NFTs Are Disrupting Film: Myco, Livepeer, Ava Labs, Bad Grrls Creative Club

articles.description: Marvel and DC Comics alum Sean Chen argues that while studios have made billions, comic artists aren't seeing even a fraction of that wealth.
articles.title: 'Iron Man' Comic Artist Sean Chen on Marvel vs. Web3

articles.description: "Eventually there's still a human brain that needs to be involved," Chen said of AI being used to create comics.
articles.title: Marvel Artist Sean Chen on How Artificial Intelligence Will Shape Comics

articles.description: Veteran actor David Bianchi spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson right before a public table read for Bianchi's upcoming drama series "RZR," to be distributed through Gala Films. The show is already greenlit and will be set in a dystopian future Los Angeles, with Ethereum and other digital assets as part of the plot. Bianchi also conducted two NFT drops to build engagement from fans.
articles.title: Actor David Bianchi Previews His Web3 TV Series 'RZR'

articles.description: Meet Mr. NFT: @Farokh, who preaches daily to hundreds of thousands of NFT faithful, and is trying to building Rug Radio into a fully formed Web3 media company. Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin from the gm podcast talk to Farokh about Rug DAO and all things NFT culture. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Farokh and the Rug Radio Roadmap

articles.description: Will Sam Bankman-Fried serve prison time? Who will be the next crypto company to go bankrupt, or the next founder to see their reputation dissolve? Will we get a new crypto law this year? Decrypt's Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Matthew Diemer of the gm podcast crew kicked off the new year by trading predictions for 2023. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Big Bold Predictions for Crypto in 2023
